titles.title: To amend title 49, United States Code, to limit eligibility for essential air service for certain locations, and for other purposes.
Defending Essential Flights and Ensuring National Security Efforts Act of 2018
Defending Essential Flights and Ensuring National Security Efforts Act of 2018
DEFENSE Act of 2018
DEFENSE Act of 2018
DEFENSE Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

bill.summary:
Defending Essential Flights and Ensuring National Security Efforts Act of 2018 or the DEFENSE Act of 2018
This bill allows an exemption from certain eligibility requirements under the essential air service program for locations at which not less than 10% of aircraft takeoffs and landings in 2017 were by aircraft of the Armed Forces.
